subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “cat”
: {{onomatopoeic|zh}}. Compare {{zh-l|喵|[[meow]], the [[onomatopoeic]] cry of a cat}}.
: {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} minimally reconstructs {{cog|och|-}} ''*mau'', reasoning that {{lang|zh|貓}}'s place among division II syllables results from its onomatopoeic nature instead of an {{cog|och|-}} medial ''*-r-''; onomatopoeia is also responsible for the {{zh-l|陰平}} tone instead of the expected {{zh-l|陽平}}.
; “modem”
: Borrowed from {{bor|zh|en|modem}}.
